Name: ButcherBoy
About the game: Butcher Boy is a simplistic casual game that is easy to learn, but hard to master. You play as a son of Butcher that works in the family workshop cutting meat. GAME FEATURES - simplistic and easy gameplay - easy to learn (use WSAD keys to move) - hard to master, each level gets more difficult - single player mode - character customization - tools customization
Meta Title: ButcherBoy: Jul 11, 2018, Racing Bros and Full Overview
